Title: Pay for Play
Plot: The team finds itself in an awkward position when agents won't stop sending ostentatious gifts to the players. A local booster pressures Coach Daniels to put his son, who so far hasn't gotten any game time, on the field.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
GuestStars: Frankie Shaw, Page Kennedy, Joe MacLeod, Gary Hudson
